subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Coach Alain Vigneault juggled his lines, and Derick Brassard scored two goals to lead the Rangers to only their second victory since Derek Stepan sustained broken ribs on Nov. 27.
snippet: Coach Alain Vigneault juggled his lines, and Derick Brassard scored two goals to lead the Rangers to only their second victory since Derek Stepan sustained broken ribs on Nov. 27.
